title: 95/164/EC: Commission Decision of 28 April 1995 amending Decision 93/436/EEC laying down specific conditions for importing fishery products from Chile (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 28 April 1995 amending Decision 93/436/EEC laying down specific  conditions for importing fishery products from Chile (Text with EEA relevance) (95/164/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex B of Decision 93/436/EEC is replaced by the Annex to this  Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 April 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
ANNEX
